a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Global change over the last 50 years
Global change across various socioeconomic and environmental parameters over the past 50 years, measured as
an index relative to the first year of available data (e.g. values in 1965 = 100).
Source: World Bank; UN FAO; BP Statistical Review of World Energy; Global Carbon Project; Maddison Project Database
